alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Douglas; Saunders; Washington (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 5:32PM CDT until July 28 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WASHINGTON...SOUTHEASTERN DODGE...NORTHWESTERN DOUGLAS AND NORTHEASTERN SAUNDERS COUNTIES... At 532 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles south of Arlington, or 6 miles east of Fremont, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fremont, Bennington, Valley, Arlington, Yutan, Waterloo, Inglewood, Leshara, Woodcliff, and Washington. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
